body: Do you have need for update_node_def=false? If not, let's just remove it. The contract with AddControLEdge() is that it will make sure the NodeDef is in sync with the added control edge (unless allow_duplicates=true, which is only in one weird specific case that we would ideally change). So we can assume that we should continue to keep the NodeDef in sync here.
